info.title: Automatic Data Extractor API
info.description:
ADE API reference. Use ReDoc at `/api` for endpoint documentation and Swagger UI at `/api/swagger` for interactive requests.

Authentication supports browser session cookies and `X-API-Key` header credentials. Every response includes `X-Request-Id` for tracing and support diagnostics.

get.description: Return the current health information for ADE.
Return installed backend/web versions and worker engine resolution mode.
List public SSO providers currently available for interactive sign-in.
Initiate the OIDC authorization flow and redirect to the configured identity provider.
Handle the OIDC callback, validate the provider response, and establish an ADE session.
